_source.text: [3] In my opinion, Missouri BUILD is a better program than Missouri Works because it subsidizes infrastructure which, once built, makes it very difficult for a company to leave Missouri because companies don't walk away from hundreds of millions of dollars in infrastructure investments very often.

text: [3] In my opinion, Missouri **BUILD** is a **better** program than Missouri Works **because** it subsidizes
infrastructure which, once built, makes it very difficult for a company to leave Missouri **because**
companies don't walk **away** from hundreds of millions of dollars in infrastructure investments very often.

_source.text: A bout with the flu or a sinus infection can also cause blurred vision in one or both eyes because of fluid build-up in the sinus cavities, which should go away as soon as you start feeling better and most of the fluid has drained away.

text: of fluid **build**-up in the sinus cavities, which should go **away** as soon as you start feeling **better** and most of the fluid has drained **away**.
